content: अभिषंगः (also अभिसंगः) {@--1@} Complete contact or union; attachment, connection, association; कन्यका दुन्वंति हृदयं मनुष्याणामीदृशाद्दुरभिसंगात् <ls>Māl. 7</ls> ill attachment or union; <ls>Māl. 8</ls>; मुहुरिति वनविभ्रमाभिषंगात् <ls>Śi. 7. 68</ls>; <ls>K. 146</ls>, <ls n="K.">290.</ls> {@--2@} Defeat, mortification, discomfiture; जाताभिषंगो नृपतिः <ls>R. 2. 30.</ls> {@--3@} A sudden blow, shock, or grief, a sudden calamity or misfortune, unexpected reverse; ततोऽभिषंगानिलविप्रविद्धा <ls>R. 14. 54</ls>, <ls n="R. 14.">77</ls>; <ls>Ku. 3. 73</ls>; °जडं विजज्ञिवान् <ls>R. 8. 75.</ls> {@--4@} Possession by devils or evil spirits; अभिघाताभिषंगाभ्यामभिचाराभिशापतः <ls>Mādh. N.</ls> {@--5@} An oath. {@--6@} Embracing; copulation. {@--7@} A curse or imprecation, abuse. {@--8@} A false charge or accusation, calumny or defamation. {@--9@} Contempt, disrespect.
